channel.title: Science Upgrades
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Science Upgrades" - Science will have twice the chance

item.title: Re: Science Upgrades
item.content:encoded: We've been putting the max amount in each day since I got back into the village. It just takes a whole lot of time and a whole lot of ryo to get it to max reliability.

item.title: Re: Science Upgrades
item.content:encoded: We really outta start investing in it. I wanna get the running man jutsu!

item.title: Re: Science Upgrades
item.content:encoded: Already planning on it, but it's still a long shot. Our Science machine is still pretty wimpy :(

item.title: Science Upgrades
item.content:encoded:
Maybe we should try today and tomorrow Science Upgrades with newest announcement:

Bonus due to bug: Today and tomorrow (as in, tonight's dayroll and tomorrow night's as well), Science and resource output will be doubled - science will have twice the chance, and you'll get 2X the ryo and resources.
